product_name: Garneau Neo Power Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: Featuring high-tech Lycra(R) Power fabric, Garneau Neo Power bike shorts sport more compression than basic knits for improved circulation. Contrast stitching and accents provide a racer look. Lycra Power fabric boasts comfortable stretch; high performance compression promotes blood circulation and active muscle recovery on long rides. Fabric has a UPF 50+ rating, offering excellent protection from harmful ultraviolet rays. Powerband compression promotes active muscle recovery. 12-panel construction provides flexibility and support for hard-working muscles. Flatlock seams help prevent uncomfortable chafing. Airzone chamois keeps air circulating and offer memory foam padding for long stretches in the saddle. Reflective elements help keep you visible in low light.
short_description: Featuring high-tech Lycra(R) Power fabric, Garneau Neo Power bike shorts sport more compression than basic knits for improved circulation. Contrast stitching and accents provide a racer look.
